comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: Note the armed guards.  The Navy must have taken exercise seriously back then.

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content:
I did not realize push ups were part of war games  :)

The Seattle was originally the Washington, hence the cross out

comment.author: 52889903@N03
comment._content: In many navies push ups are a form of punishment for the crew when the drill isn't up to mark.
